name: The Forgotten Past (TFP) - ALPHA
description:
Hello, This is "The Forgotten Past" made by LordStudios

This is an intense 2d side-scrolling/platformer shooter game, with sprites very loosely based on weapons and soldiers from the second world war. This game was made in roughly 15 hours in the dev's spare time. It was made by amateur developer Aiden Lord, who is a full time highschool student (hence being made in what little free time which was available). Almost all sprites were made from scratch and this game was coded in Gamemaker Studio 2. 

P.S (There also is an easter egg + alt ending included... see if you can find it!)

Desc. Cont.

You've just joined up with the 199th regiment of foot maggot! Gear up and grab your rifle soldier! Race across the pixelated battlefields of the Great Cyber War, fighting the tyrannical mennace that is the HyPixel Regime. Shoot, dodge, and strafe your way through the numerous waves of enemies in these levels, (more to be added really soon, along with bosses and new assets). Good Luck Soldier!  Now, GET MOVING!

Controls:

up arrow = jump

left arrow = move/strafe left

right arrow = move/strafe right

down arrow = interact (with signs when nearby)

left mouse button (press and hold) = shoot

enter = (used to select things in menu)

R key = restart game / return to menu

ctrl (control) + F key = toggle fullscreen (on/off)

Dev. notes:

HOPE YOU ENJOY! HAVE FUN!
